name: mfml-cli
description: The ICU MessageFormat + XML/HTML command-line interface.

scripts.build: tsc --project ./tsconfig.build.json && npm run rollup && npm run rollup-adapters && npm run rollup-presets
scripts.rollup-adapters: for p in $(ls ./lib/adapters); do rollup --exports default --external chalk,mfml-compiler --input ./lib/adapters/$p --file ./lib/adapters/$p --format cjs --plugin @rollup/plugin-node-resolve || exit 1; done
scripts.rollup-presets: for p in $(ls ./lib/presets); do rollup --exports default --external speedy-entities,tag-soup,marked --input ./lib/presets/$p --file ./lib/presets/$p --format cjs --plugin @rollup/plugin-node-resolve || exit 1; done

author: Savva Mikhalevski <smikhalevski@gmail.com>
